meta.title: Ali Nails | Premium Nail and Eyelash Services
meta.description: Premium nail and eyelash extension services tailored to enhance your natural beauty
meta.keywords: nail salon, eyelash extensions, beauty salon, manicure, pedicure, gel nails, acrylic nails

hero.title: Elevate Your Beauty
hero.subtitle: Premium nail and eyelash extension services tailored to enhance your natural beauty

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Passionate About Beauty
about.paragraph1: Hello everyone! My name is Alicia, and the world of beauty has always been my passion.
about.paragraph2: I started this journey over 20 years ago, and I can proudly say that I love my job. I specialize in manicures, makeup, and eyelash extensions, and I have recently started training in micropigmentation to continue offering the best to my clients. I love constantly learning and staying up to date with the latest techniques to provide high-quality service.
about.paragraph3: For me, beauty is more than just an aesthetic detail—it’s a form of self-expression and self-care. I truly enjoy seeing how even the smallest changes can make someone feel more confident and happy. I am a kind and friendly person, and I always give my best to ensure that every visit is a special experience.
about.paragraph4: For me, beauty is more than just an aesthetic detail—it’s a form of self-expression and self-care. I truly enjoy seeing how even the smallest changes can make someone feel more confident and happy. I am a kind and friendly person, and I always give my best to ensure that every visit is a special experience.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: We offer a wide range of premium nail and eyelash services to enhance your natural beauty

manicure.title: Gel Polish Manicure
manicure.description: Manicure with cuticle care and long-lasting gel polish application.

gelPolish.title: Soft Gel
gelPolish.description: Long-lasting soft gel with a perfect finish.

acrylicNails.title: Acrylic Nails
acrylicNails.description: Full set of acrylic nails with design options.

eyelashExtensions.title: Eyelash Extensions
eyelashExtensions.description: Classic, hybrid, or volume lash extensions.

nailRemoval.title: Acrylic or Gel Polish Removal
nailRemoval.description: Gentle removal of gel polish or acrylic without damaging the natural nail.

pedicure.title: Gel Polish Pedicure
pedicure.description: Pedicure with cuticle care and long-lasting gel polish application.

gallery.title: Our Gallery
gallery.subtitle: Browse through our portfolio of nail designs and eyelash extensions

testimonials.title: Client Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: See what our clients have to say about their experience

sarah.name: Carmen C.
sarah.text: I'm delighted with Alicia. I started going a few years ago and I find her super professional and meticulous. She also uses high-quality products. My nails look beautiful every time I visit. I highly recommend her.

jessica.name: Alba D.
jessica.text: I've never had a better experience with manicures, pedicures, gel nails with all kinds of designs, and lash extensions. The owner is lovely and very professional, with many years of experience. It's a trustworthy, high-quality place where I’ve had all sorts of nail art done — from 3D gel designs to hand-drawn art and effects like the baby boomer style. 100% recommended.

emma.name: Greta G.
emma.text: Excellent!! The place is super clean and cozy, Ali is very professional, sweet, and detail-oriented. I was absolutely thrilled! Thank you so much.

location.title: Visit Us
location.subtitle: We're conveniently located in the heart of the city
